db
Class GlobMatch

java.lang.Object
  db.GlobMatch

public class GlobMatch
extends java.lang.Object

This is a utility function borrowed from else where to perform the glob-style pattern matching. This is used in the client to match the local files, e.g. "*.txt". The original source of the file is http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1247772/is-there-an-equivalent-of-java-util-regex-for-glob-type-patterns
